Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations, offering unparalleled performance and quality. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than just $10000 to you. Considering its immense value, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to market rates. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
